email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Your Apple ID has been locked

Dear Valued Apple Customer,

We regret to inform you that your Apple ID has been locked due to suspicious activity detected on your account. To ensure the security of your personal information and prevent any unauthorized access, we kindly ask you to reset your Apple ID password immediately.

Please click on the following link to proceed with the password reset process: [phishing link]

It is crucial that you take action as soon as possible to avoid any further complications with your account. Failure to reset your password within the next 24 hours may result in permanent suspension of your Apple ID.

If you did not initiate this action or if you have any concerns regarding the security of your account, please contact Apple Support immediately for further assistance.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Apple Support Team
